name: Ildra
appearance: Lean as a reef crow, sea-scarred skin, kelp-woven cloak, wrists ringed with barnacle bracelets.
character: Wry and mercenary with a stubborn soft spot for lost sailors.
talents: hearing the bell no hand rings
reading kelp ropes for hidden paths
flaws: bad knee that locks in cold
dreams: retire with a private beacon fueled by kelp resin
see the petrified titan’s face beneath the Spires
outsmart the Cartel one last time
secrets: hid a Lantern Cartel light-crystal in a coral chimney after a storm
maps a kelp ladder that bypasses the worst false bells
sold two different syndicates the same ‘safe’ channel on purpose
